info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr

Class RTR

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant
      • info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.RTR

  • @Component(role=org.apache.maven.AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant.class,
           hint="rtr")
public class RTR
extends org.apache.maven.AbstractMavenLifecycleParticipant
    The entry point for the Smart Reactor Maven Extension.
    Author:
    Ronald Jack Jenkins Jr.

      • isBackupPomsCreated

        public boolean isBackupPomsCreated()
        Indicates whether or not backup POMs were created by the release process.
        Returns:
        backupPomsCreated true if backup POMs have been created, false otherwise.

      • isExternalSnapshotsAllowed

        public boolean isExternalSnapshotsAllowed()
        Indicates whether or not the Smart Reactor should allow a release reactor containing references to any non-reactor SNAPSHOT artifacts.
        Returns:
        true if allowed, false if prohibited.

      • isRelease

        public boolean isRelease()
        Indicates whether or not a release was requested.
        Returns:
        true if a release was requested, false otherwise.

      • setBackupPomsCreated

        public void setBackupPomsCreated(boolean backupPomsCreated)
        Sets the flag that indicates whether or not backup POMs were created by the release process.
        Parameters:
        backupPomsCreated - true if backup POMs have been created, false otherwise.
